question: What the note is at the 12th fret of the 1st and 6th strings of a standard-tuned 6-string guitar?
vanilla_rag_result: At the 12th fret of a standard-tuned 6-string guitar, the note on the 1st string (high E) is E, and the note on the 6th string (low E) is also E. Therefore, both the 1st and 6th strings play the note E at the 12th fret.
